bug.question: I have spots and fly around. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have dots on my body.
🍃 I like to land on leaves.
🐞 I am a small bug!

bug.question: I buzz and make honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I fly near flowers.
💛 I make something sweet to eat.
🐝 I live in a hive with many friends.

bug.question: I wiggle on the ground, then turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat lots of leaves.
🌈 I change into something beautiful.
🐛 I crawl before I fly.

bug.question: I carry food together in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🏡 I live in a colony.

bug.question: I hop around and like to eat plants. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I love green things.
🦵 I have strong legs for jumping.
🦗 I make a chirping sound.

bug.question: I fly at night and am attracted to light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I only come out when it's dark.
💡 I like to fly around lamps.
🦋 I am related to butterflies.

bug.question: I can be green, brown, or black, and I blend in with sticks and leaves. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like part of a tree.
🌿 I am good at hiding.
🚶 You might not see me walking on a branch.

bug.question: I have many legs and crawl in the dirt. Who am I?

hints.text: 💯 I have more legs than you do!
🕳️ I like to hide under rocks and logs.
🐛 I am long and segmented.

bug.question: I live in the water as a nymph and fly around in the air as an adult. I'm known for my big eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I start my life in a pond.
👀 My big eyes help me see.
🌿 I like to fly near the reeds.

bug.question: I can jump very high and have long antennae. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often found in fields of tall grass.
📡 My long antennae help me sense my surroundings.
🎼 I make a rattling or clicking noise with my wings.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am hot and yellow.
😎 I help the flowers grow.
⬆️ I go up in the morning.

cosmos.question: I am round and white, and I come out at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am a circle.
🐺 Animals howl at me.
🛌 You see me when you go to bed.

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky, far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am very small in the sky.
🌌 There are lots and lots of me.
🔭 You can see me with a telescope.

cosmos.question: We go around the Sun. You live on one. What are we?

hints.text: 🌱 Plants grow on me.
🌍 I am round.
🚶‍♀️ People live on me.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant ball of hot gas that gives light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
☀️ The sun is one of me.
✨ I twinkle from far away

cosmos.question: I am what Earth goes around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I give us light during the day.
🔥 I am a very big, hot star.
🌎 Earth goes around me.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that goes around the Sun and you live on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌳 I have trees and grass.
🏘️ You can find your house on me!

cosmos.question: I am red, and people want to visit me from Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me in a rocket.
🔴 I am red.
🤖 They might find robots there.

cosmos.question: I have rings around me and am very big! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 I have pretty rings.
🪐 I'm a planet.
💨 The rings are made of ice and rock.

cosmos.question: Many stars together make me, a big group in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 I have many, many stars.
🥛 I look like spilled milk in the sky
✨ Our sun is part of me.
